summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Ida Street, from 35th Avenue Southwest to 39th Avenue Southwest; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8989 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
